author: cms-sw
body: This version of cmake fixes the https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/issues/20621 issue which was breaking root master IBs ( https://sft.its.cern.ch/jira/browse/ROOT-10758 ). Once this is merged then we can again build root master with `-DLLVM_BUILD_TYPE=Release`
title: [Cmake] update cmake to version 3.17.2
